data: No well informed resident of Millsburgh, when referring to the principal industry of his little manufacturing city, ever says “the mills”—it is always “the Mill.”
No well informed resident of Millsburgh, when referring to the principal industry of his little manufacturing city, ever says "the mills"--it is always "the Mill."
